an5.212:1.1: “Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhandanakarako kalahakarako vivadakarako bhassakarako sanghe adhikaranakarako, tassa panca adinava patikankha.
an5.212:1.3: Anadhigatam nadhigacchati, adhigata parihayati, papako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati, sammulho kalam karoti, kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati.
an5.212:1.4: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhandanakarako kalahakarako vivadakarako bhassakarako sanghe adhikaranakarako, tassa ime panca adinava patikankha”ti.
